titles.title: To direct the Director of National Intelligence to submit to State election officials and Congress annual reports on pre-election threats for general elections for Federal office.
To direct the Director of National Intelligence to submit to State election officials and Congress annual reports on pre-election threats for general elections for Federal office.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

bill.summary: This bill requires the Office of the Director of National Intelligence to annually report on threats to election infrastructure and make recommendations to address those threats.
